016
017package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.yaml;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.Configuration;
020import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.MappedConfiguration;
021import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.file.AbstractFileConfiguration;
022import org.jetbrains.annotations.Contract;
023import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
024import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
025import org.jetbrains.annotations.Unmodifiable;
026import org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions;
027import org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions;
028import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
029import org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.Constructor;
030import org.yaml.snakeyaml.representer.Representer;
031
032import java.io.IOException;
033import java.io.InputStream;
034import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
035import java.nio.file.Files;
036import java.nio.file.OpenOption;
037import java.nio.file.Path;
038import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
039import java.util.Collections;
040import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Map;
043import java.util.Objects;
044import java.util.Set;
045import java.util.function.Supplier;
046
047/**
048 * A class that implements {@link Configuration} for Yaml file.
049 * <p>
050 * This class can load from or save to Yaml file.
051 * <p>
052 * In the internal, this manages keys and values in {@link MappedConfiguration}.
053 */
054public class YamlConfiguration extends AbstractFileConfiguration {
055
056    private static final Supplier<Yaml> DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER = YamlConfiguration::createYaml;
057
058    private static @NotNull Yaml createYaml() {
059        var dumperOptions = new DumperOptions();
060        dumperOptions.setDefaultFlowStyle(DumperOptions.FlowStyle.BLOCK);
061
062        var representer = new Representer(dumperOptions);
063        representer.setDefaultFlowStyle(DumperOptions.FlowStyle.BLOCK);
064
065        var loaderOptions = new LoaderOptions();
066
067        // ConfigAPI is intended to load configuration files from trusted sources such as the local files.
068        // It is NOT intended to load from untrusted sources.
069        //noinspection VulnerableCodeUsages
070        var constructor = new Constructor(LinkedHashMap.class, loaderOptions);
071
072        return new Yaml(constructor, representer, dumperOptions, loaderOptions);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path}.
077     *
078     * @param path the path to load or save
079     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
080     */
081    @Contract("_ -> new")
082    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path) {
083        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER));
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path} and other {@link Configuration}.
088     *
089     * @param path  the path to load or save
090     * @param other the other {@link Configuration}
091     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
092     */
093    @Contract("_, _ -> new")
094    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Configuration other) {
095        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(DEFAULT_YAML_SUPPLIER), other);
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path}
100     * and specified supplier of {@link Yaml}.
101     *
102     * @param path         the path to load or save
103     * @param yamlSupplier the supplier of {@link Yaml}
104     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
105     */
106    @Contract("_, _ -> new")
107    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Supplier<Yaml> yamlSupplier) {
108        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(yamlSupplier));
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Creates the new {@link YamlConfiguration} from specified {@link Path},
113     * other {@link Configuration}, and specified supplier of {@link Yaml}.
114     *
115     * @param path         the path to load or save
116     * @param yamlSupplier the supplier of {@link Yaml}
117     * @param other        the other {@link Configuration}
118     * @return the new {@link YamlConfiguration}
119     */
120    @Contract("_, _, _ -> new")
121    public static @NotNull YamlConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Supplier<Yaml> yamlSupplier, @NotNull Configuration other) {
122        return new YamlConfiguration(path, ThreadLocal.withInitial(yamlSupplier), other);
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Loads from {@link InputStream} using {@link Yaml#loadAs(InputStream, Class)}.
127     *
128     * @param input the {@link InputStream} to load
129     * @return the loaded {@link Configuration}
130     */
131    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
132    public static @NotNull Configuration loadFromInputStream(@NotNull InputStream input) {
133        var map = createYaml().loadAs(input, LinkedHashMap.class);
134        return MappedConfiguration.create(map);
135    }
136
137    private final ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal;
138    private Configuration config;
139
140    private YamlConfiguration(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal) {
141        super(path);
142        this.yamlThreadLocal = yamlThreadLocal;
143    }
144
145    private YamlConfiguration(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull ThreadLocal<Yaml> yamlThreadLocal, @NotNull Configuration other) {
146        super(path);
147        this.yamlThreadLocal = yamlThreadLocal;
148        this.config = MappedConfiguration.create(other);
149    }
150
151    @Override
152    public @Nullable Object get(@NotNull String path) {
153        return config != null ? config.get(path) : null;
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
158        if (config == null) {
159            config = MappedConfiguration.create();
160        }
161
162        config.set(path, value);
163    }
164
165    @Override
166    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<String> getKeyList() {
167        return config != null ? config.getKeyList() : Collections.emptyList();
168    }
169
170    @Override
171    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable Set<Object> getValues() {
172        return config != null ? config.getValues() : Collections.emptySet();
173    }
174
175    @Override
176    public @Nullable Configuration getSection(@NotNull String path) {
177        return config != null ? config.getSection(path) : null;
178    }
179
180    @Override
181    public @NotNull Configuration getOrCreateSection(@NotNull String path) {
182        if (config == null) {
183            config = MappedConfiguration.create();
184        }
185
186        return config.getOrCreateSection(path);
187    }
188
189    @Override
190    public void clear() {
191        if (config != null) {
192            config.clear();
193            config = null;
194        }
195
196        setLoaded(false);
197    }
198
199    @Override
200    public @NotNull YamlConfiguration copy() {
201        var copied =
202                config != null ?
203                        new YamlConfiguration(getPath(), yamlThreadLocal, config) :
204                        new YamlConfiguration(getPath(), yamlThreadLocal);
205
206        copied.setLoaded(isLoaded());
207
208        return copied;
209    }
210
211    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
212    @Override
213    public void load() throws IOException {
214        clear();
215
216        if (!Files.isRegularFile(getPath())) {
217            return;
218        }
219
220        Yaml yaml = yamlThreadLocal.get();
221        Map<Object, Object> map;
222
223        try (var reader = Files.newBufferedReader(getPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
224            map = yaml.loadAs(reader, LinkedHashMap.class);
225        }
226
227        config = MappedConfiguration.create(map);
228
229        setLoaded(true);
230    }
231
232    @Override
233    public void save() throws IOException {
234        Yaml yaml = yamlThreadLocal.get();
235
236        var map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
237
238        if (config != null) {
239            for (var key : config.getKeyList()) {
240                map.put(key, config.get(key));
241            }
242        }
243
244        var parent = getPath().getParent();
245
246        if (parent != null) {
247            Files.createDirectories(parent);
248        }
249
250        OpenOption[] options = {StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.WRITE, StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING};
251
252        try (var writer = Files.newBufferedWriter(getPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8, options)) {
253            yaml.dump(map, writer);
254        }
255    }
256
257    @Override
258    public boolean equals(Object o) {
259        if (this == o) return true;
260        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
261        YamlConfiguration that = (YamlConfiguration) o;
262        return yamlThreadLocal.equals(that.yamlThreadLocal) && Objects.equals(config, that.config);
263    }
264
265    @Override
266    public int hashCode() {
267        return Objects.hash(yamlThreadLocal, config);
268    }
269
270    @Override
271    public String toString() {
272        return "YamlConfiguration{" +
273                "yamlThreadLocal=" + yamlThreadLocal +
274                ", config=" + config +
275                '}';
276    }
277
278    /**
279     * Gets the loaded {@link Configuration}.
280     *
281     * @return the loaded {@link Configuration}
282     * @throws IllegalStateException if this configuration is not loaded
283     */
284    public @NotNull Configuration getLoadedConfiguration() {
285        if (config != null) {
286            return config;
287        } else {
288            throw new IllegalStateException("this configuration is not loaded");
289        }
290    }
291}
